scripts.dev: npx concurrently --names "CSS,JS" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "npm run dev:styles" "npm run dev:scripts"
scripts.dev:styles: npx postcss resources/css/index.css -o resources/dist/custom-fields.css --config postcss.config.cjs --watch --env development
scripts.build:styles: npx postcss resources/css/index.css -o resources/dist/custom-fields.css --config postcss.config.cjs --env production
scripts.build: npm run build:styles && npm run build:scripts
